meanings.definition: A large wading bird with a long neck and legs.
meanings.sent1: The courlan gracefully waded through the shallow water in search of fish.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a beautiful courlan by the lake, standing tall and elegant.
meanings.sent3: The courlan decided to have a dance-off with the flamingo, much to the amusement of the other birds.
meanings.sent4: Her long neck and legs made her look like a majestic courlan in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The courlan's distinctive call echoed across the wetlands, a sound I will never forget.

meanings.definition: To pursue or chase after something.
meanings.sent1: The detective decided to courlan after the suspect through the busy streets.
meanings.sent2: She courlaned after the ice cream truck, hoping to catch it before it left the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy courlaned after the squirrel, causing chaos in the park.
meanings.sent4: His dreams seemed to courlan after him, always just out of reach.
meanings.sent5: The determined athlete courlaned after the gold medal, pushing himself to the limit in every race.
